job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
About Us
LumApps teams across the world all share the same objective. We want to help teams in their quest to develop strong cultures and share knowledge across communities, the way we do every day.
LumApps helps organizations transform the way they communicate, collaborate, and engage with their customers, partners, and most importantly, their employees. Leading companies rely on our solutions, LumApps Social Collaborative Intranet and LumApps Employee Social Advocacy, to make their teams more productive. Our solutions contribute to smarter, more efficient, and better-connected workforces around the world. Because ultimately, our mission is to make people feel that they belong and have a purpose.
About The Role
LumApps is seeking to add a Migrations Engineer to our current team of 4. This individual will work predominantly with our customers as well as across multiple internal teams to develop, execute, test, and improve the process of data migration into LumApps. As the Migrations Engineer for LumApps you will provide your technical expertise and product knowledge to ensure successful project implementations and project migrations, working closely with customers and Professional Services teams as the SME of LumApps’ APIs, LumApps’ technical functionality and integrations, and LumApps’ migration expert. This position will allow you to work side by side with our customers to define technical expectations and to address technical roadblocks.
What You Will Do
Work with LumApps’ customers, internal stakeholders and partners to migrate data into LumApps using REST APIs (extract - transform - load)
Improve LumApps’ data migration tools (Python code) to meet new business requirements from our customers
Responsible for maintaining and improving python code, collaborating occasionally with other developers
Responsible for the QA, execution and delivery of data migrations into LumApps
SME of the LumApps’ APIs and LumApps’ SDK
Help create and maintain new tools that will allow Customers to migrate data into LumApps from any source (export, CSV, XML, JSON, APIs)
As part of the Professional Services Org (PSO) you will have to occasionally meet with customers to gather migration requirements and/or to explain migration strategies to non-technical audiences
What We Are Looking For
2+ years of practical experience as a Migrations Engineer, or Software Developer.
2+ years of experience reading/debugging/writing/maintaining code (Python)
2+ years of experience with REST APIs; proficient in ETL processes
Experience with SQL Databases (Postgres)
Experience with Python libraries like html2text, beautifulsoup, pdfkit, redis, requests, httpx, xmltodict, pypandoc, or willingness to learn
Experience with Flask
Comfortable working with Google’s set of collaboration tools (Workspace)
Ability to work in multiple projects, with different deliverables and deadlines
Ability to thrive in ambiguity and a fast paced environment
Preferred Qualifications
Working experience with Angular, React.js, Vanilla JavaScript is a plus
Experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) is a plus
System administrator level knowledge of Linux is a plus
What We Offer
A program designed with your success in mind. We're looking for intelligent, hard-working, and ethical individuals that will appreciate a well-coached path to a rewarding career
100% employer-paid benefits for employees, starting day one
Awesome coworkers and culture
401(k) with employer match
So much more!
If our core values of: “Be bold, do amazing things”, “Say what you mean, Do what you say”, “One team, Same mission”, and “Always be evolving,” speak to you, apply to join our team today!
